name: Lichen Planopilaris
chief_complaint: I've been losing hair in patches, and my scalp is itchy and scaly.
prognosis: Variable; early treatment may halt progression, but hair regrowth in scarred areas is unlikely
description: Lichen planopilaris is a rare inflammatory condition causing scarring hair loss, considered a variant of lichen planus affecting the scalp. It involves immune-mediated destruction of hair follicles.
